text:
Notonthehighstreet.com | www.notonthehighstreet.com | Ruby Developer | Full Time | Richmond, Greater London (UK) | ONSITE

We are a curated marketplace that brings together the most unique, stylish and never-before-seen products that are hard to find anywhere else.

That’s why we’re home to more than 5,000 of the UK’s best small creative businesses that we’re proud to call our Partners.

You will building end to end solutions for our Partners to manage their day to day businesses. Our tools help simplify complex calculation for delivery of products to our customers.

Stack: Ruby, Rails, JavaScript, Java, Go, AWS

Team: We have self-organised product teams who implement a mix of SCRUM, Kanban and Extreme Programming.

Interview: Telephone > Tech Task > Face to Face

OUR STORY: http://www.notonthehighstreet.com/pages/our-story

APPLY: https://isw.changeworknow.co.uk/notonthehighstreet/vms/e/sto...

Contact: yvonneachan-oryema@notonthehighstreet.com
